page.title: 18Military Steyning
page.content: On the Steyning Downs the R.A.F practise their flying because it is a hard place to fly around.They fly low so it is easy to see them.There is also a rifle range on the Downs where the Army practise their shooting. Normal citizens can practise shooting as well if they have free time.There was a plane crash during the war and the plane was full of German soldiers and one of them was very highly ranked.The Vicar wanted them to be buried in Steyning Church grounds but no-one else did. In the end they were buried there. There was only one bomb dropped over Steyning during the second world war. There was an army base near Steyning.At Wiston pond there is a German petrol tank of a plane.There are lots of airraid shelters like the one at Mouse Lane.
